action.set_spawn.success: Your spawn point has been set!
secret.4: [!] 你听见不远处有一道沉重的门被打开的声音。
event.becon_all_gone: 所有烽火台都已关闭！进攻敌方大本营！
event.door_open: 你听见远处有一道门打开。
event.lever_dropped: 你听见远处传来一声喀当，听起来像梯子落下的声音，不知道是在哪呢?
mob.rawr.line.1: 嘶嘶嘶嘶...呃不对，吼喔喔喔喔!
mob.mad_witch.line.1: [§d愤怒女巫§r] 你小子敢摘老娘的花!
mob.mad_witch.line.2: [§d愤怒女巫§r] 我额日你们这种人准备了特制的药水……嘻嘻嘻嘻！
event.ever_night: [!] 有玩家进入了云海都市。时间暂时固定为永夜，持续下雨！
event.ever_night_end: [!] 所有玩家均已离开云海都市。天气与日夜恢复运转！
area.16.switch: 你听见了一个小小的啪答声。
area.16.grave: 听起来像是远方有一座巨大的陵墓打开了……
area.16.line.1: [§bA Whispering Voice§f] Life might knock you down, but doesn't mean you can't get back up again and try.
area.16.line.2: [§bA Whispering Voice§f] The more you try the further you will get.
area.16.line.3: [§bA Whispering Voice§f] Don't give up now, you are almost there.
area.16.line.4: [§cExiel§f] Welcome welcome, come right in and make yourself cozy mwhahaha...
area.16.line.5: [§cExiel§f] Awaken from your slumber you pile of bones, defend your prisoner!
event.ever_night.16: [!] A player entered Mount Fayril. The world is covered in thunderstorm and eternal night!
event.ever_night.16_end: [!] All players have left Mount Fayril. The day light cycle have returned to normal!
area.17.save.red: [§cVilune§r] Hello ~ the wind told me you were coming. I am Vilune, goddess of heat and thank you for freeing me. It really is such a tragedy what happened to Exiel long ago that compelled him to start the war, I wonder where we would all be right now and what the state of things would be like if none of this had ever happened.
area.17.save.green: [§aFairune§r] Hello ~ the wind told me you were coming. I am Fairune, goddess of nature and thank you for freeing me. I know you and Exiel use to be great friends, but put those feelings aside. Exiel has changed from the friendly enderman we once knew to someone blinded by hatred.
area.17.save.yellow: [§eGorune§r] Hello ~ the wind told me you were coming. I am Gorune, goddess of earth and thank you for freeing me. I can hear through stone for very far distances and I know what Exiel is planning! He plans to transcend this dimension at midnight and summon forth another terror of the void world to unleash on us all! Quickly, we must get out of here and stop him!
area.17.save.blue: [§bTypune§r] Hello ~ the wind told me you were coming. I am Typune, goddess of water and thank you for freeing me. This must end once and for all, we will not fall for any more tricks that Exiel tries to pull on us. He must be stopped if we are to ever all find peace again in this world.
area.17.save.open: Sounds like a door from afar just opened...
ui.player_page.locked.1: If you are not using a container,

ui.tp.2: which allows other players to teleport
ui.tp.3: to your location. Lasts for 90 seconds
ui.tp.4: If you leave the waypoint, or take damage,
ui.tp.5: the waypoint will be removed immediately.
ui.music.1: If your music is not playing correctly,
boss.wither.lose: §f[§c守卫者 Witley§f] 你们全都难逃一死!
boss.wither.name: 守卫者 Witley
selectWorld.backupWarning.experimental: You are about to continue your journey on §aTerra Restore§r. Maybe save a backup?
selectWorld.backupQuestion.experimental: Hint: you have §aTerra Restore§r resource pack installed. Uninstall it if you are not playing Terra Restore
boss.hint.general:
General hints:
•Be sure to use the three health potions that you are given
•If you jump while hitting monsters in melee you will do critical hits with any hit done while in the falling part of the jump, which increases the damage done by the hit by 50%%
boss.hint.general.2: Too hard? You can continue your journey, come back later and try again!
boss.wither.hint.1: A special temporary weapon will spawn here every minute during the fight.
boss.wither.hint.2: You will be given temporary splash potions of healing at the start of each boss fight. This boss fight also contains absorption potions on a timer in the four corners of the room, and two regen potion spawners in the two middle raised platforms.
boss.wither.hint.3: During boss fights you are teleported into the boss's room in adventure mode, meaning you can't place or destroy blocks. On top of this, some gamerules will change such as keep inventory; if you die during a boss fight you will not lose your items.
boss.wither.hint.4: This hint is still being written, and it is subject to change. !-<needs update>-!
boss.wither.hint.5:
Hints and strategies:
•Try and make sure you always have the regeneration effect.
•Take advantage of the bow that spawns in the middle, and use that bow when the boss is around 55%% health to push her below 50%% with to initiate the melee phase.
•It is very hard for the boss to hit you if you keep sprinting away and moving around, use this to your advantage.
boss.wither.hint.6:
Boss abilities:
•A temporary powerful bow spawns in the middle of the room every minute.
•The four corners of the room have absorption potions spawn once all lamps light up for that corner.
•Two cakes spawn in opposite edges of the room in case you can't stop to eat.
•The two raised platforms near the middle of the room will splash you with regeneration if you stand on them.
•The middle area is either surrounded with air, water, or lava depending on what difficulty you choose.
boss.wither.hint.7:
Gear/item check:
•Wither's are affected by the smite enchant so a sword with smite will help a lot.
•Projectile and blast protection enchants do not reduce the damage of the Wither's projectiles, only protection does.
•Make sure you have a decent supply of arrows for this fight.
•Any potions you acquired up to this point could be useful but is in no way required.
•Be sure that none of your weapons or armor are close to breaking.
item.ancient_wool.lore: Ancient wool that contains a special power
box.error.lock: This reward is not yet unlocked!
ui.showcase.empty: You are not holding any item.
ui.showcase.name: Display Item
ui.showcase.1: Display the item you are holding
event.front.start: §f[§bSystem§f]§r %s triggered story event: §6Battle For the Barrier§r!
event.warn.once: This event will only trigger once. All players should join by teleporting to the system waypoint.
event.front.countdown: You are joining %2$s in %1$s seconds, do not leave the area.
event.front.name: Battle For the Barrier
front.head: [§9Commander Numa§r]
front.line.1: Soldiers! On this day, we will no longer cower in fear and hide behind the wall we built there! We will no longer have to fear Doomloo and his army! We will no longer have to fear monsters breaking through the wall in the middle of the night when we are asleep!
front.line.2: Because today, we will finally push back and take back this precious land that we lost ever so long ago. We will restore this land back to the way it was before, little by little! And today, today the sun will shine in this land once more!
front.line.3: It's project sunshine and burn baby! Let the bedrock covering the land in darkness be destroyed! We will be victorious!
front.line.4: Now, Snow Golems - to your posts and shoot down any blazes that try to set ourselves aflame! Iron Golems - you are the guardians of this pack, protect us all from those treacherous fiends! Engineers - up to the gunship and tear down the bedrock that prevents the sun from shining! Onward now to victory!
front.line.5: And you - I can tell by the look in your eyes you are a tough one. We need a strong warrior capable of using the boatachutes and doing aerial assaults on the 4 structures with beacons.
front.line.6: The beacons are protecting the enemy keep with a magical forcefield where Doomloo resides! Those beacons must be destroyed if we are to win this! And do not be foolish and try to attempt this by ground assault, the monsters will swarm you in seconds.
front.line.7: Never used a boatachute before? Warp up to the gunship over there, go to the dispenser on the side and launch a boat. Once inside the boat aim where you want to go and push forward. Right before you hit the ground you must get out of the boat or you will surely break all your bones from the fall, use f5 to help judge when you are about to hit the ground.
front.line.8: Two last things I must bring to your attention. Before doing a arial assault make sure you take a assault potion right near the boatachute dispensers. Having the potion hit you on your head directly will make the potion last longer.
front.line.9: Lastly, there is a enemy gunship over there which appears to have some nice treasures aboard but it is well guarded. Our boatachutes can not reach it...Maybe if you used a teleportation pearl and did a surprise attack? Even then, making sure you land on top of it could be tough, and right as soon as you get on there you will be swarmed by enemies. Only a true hero could pull that off!
front.line.10: That will be all, may the force be with you, dismissed!
front.locked: You must complete an event to use this teleporter.
front.unlocked: [!] Event completed! You may now warp to the gunships.
boss.army.hint.1:
Gear/item check:
•All monsters in the fight are affected by smite which makes the fight significantly easier.
•I'd suggest using full prot enchanted iron/diamond armor, preferably around protection 3. One piece of fire resistance or projectile protection isn't bad for tanking the skeletons shots too.
•Don't forget to use any armor recipes that you have found so far.
•Any potions you acquired up to this point could be useful but is in no way required.
•Be sure that none of your weapons or armor are close to breaking.
boss.army.hint.2:
Boss abilities:
•At the start of the fight you will gain temporary buffs including: regen, absorption, fire resistance, strength, and speed.
•The start of the fight includes a chase phase where you have to run to the end to start the boss fight.
•Around every 30 seconds the boss will release baby zombies leashed up to fences and summon another batch of them.
•The boss has a skeleton riding on top of him which slows him down a bit. Once this skeleton is dead the boss will become more and more faster every 30 seconds. Up to a total of 5 times at which point he also gains a strength buff to one hit kill you.
•A cake will keep respawning at the back of the boss's room.
•The skeleton blocks all arrows from hitting the boss, meaning the boss can only be meleed until the skeleton dies.you choose.
boss.army.hint.3:
Hints and strategies:
•The temporary buffs at the start do not last long, getting to the boss as quick as possible is very important so you can take advantage of the buffs as much as you can.
•Meleeing the boss/skeleton will do much more damage to them than your bow, especially if you still have the strength effect still up. It can be hard to melee them with the skeleton constantly shooting you though, so having your back against a wall can make that easier.
•It is totally possible to rush down this boss quite quickly but it can be very risky.
•Doing some damage to the boss while the skeleton is still riding him will make the 2nd phase not take anywhere near as long, meaning the boss won't speed up as much.
•Running around in circles around the outer edges of the room will make it much harder for the skeleton to shoot you. your advantage.
boss.army.name: Tiny Doomloo
boss.army.skele.name: Doomloo's Skeleton
boss.army.line.2: They are swarming out of the walls! Run!!! I have given you buffs but they won't last long. Get in there and kill their commander and get out quick before you die!
boss.army.line.3: Wow, talk about a hunk of bones weighing you down!
boss.army.line.5:
I AM UNSTOPPABLE!
§c[!] Boss is now in full speed and is enraged!
boss.army.lose: 你们死了以后也要加入我的军团！
front.line.11: We did it warriors, after ages of hard work and teamwork and bloodshed! The war has been won and the disgusting monsters are fleeing!
front.line.12: We will now have a moment of destruction for those who have fallen, engineer - aim the guns and fire at their base!
front.line.13: May the monsters cower in fear and not show their faces back here ever again! Down with the bedrock ceiling over there too, let any of the survivors down there feel the rising sun, be it soldiers or monsters!
front.line.14: There is still a lot of clean up to do here, and it will take a long time to fully recover this once beautiful valley. We owe a major thanks to you who valiantly penetrated the enemies defenses and slain commander Doomloo!
front.line.15: May you be successful in your journeys, where ever they may take you in life and that you hold your head high and never back down from fear. May you feel the rising sun inside you hit your face as you spread your wings and take flight!!
front.line.16: Be careful though, for we do not know what evil lies beyond this valley or what might be taking place at the portal that bridges our world with Exiel's. I have no doubts in your ability to face the unknown, but that being said it is still dangerous to go alone. Please take this.
front.line.17: Now then crew, we have some clean up to do!
boss.void.hint.1: Make sure to put unbreaking on all your armor and weapons so you don't have to repair them so much. Also be sure to have an anvil and some iron ready in your ender chest for repairs on the go.
boss.void.hint.2:
Gear/item check:
•All monsters in the fight excluding creepers are affected by smite which makes the fight significantly easier.
•Knockback/punch weapons can be very useful here to quickly get rid of monsters.
•I'd suggest using full prot enchanted iron/diamond armor, preferably at least protection 3.
•Don't forget to use any armor recipes that you have found so far.
•Any potions you acquired up to this point could be useful but is in no way required.
•Be sure that none of your weapons or armor are close to breaking.
boss.void.hint.3:
Boss Abilities:
•This boss goes through a cycle, with each full pass of the cycle gaining a higher attack damage.
•When the boss gets to around 20%% health the cycles will go a lot faster.
•Boss sometimes jumps and crushes down. Remember to run away from that.
•Blocks under players' feet will slowly cracks and breaks, leaving holes in the arena. Boss's skill will also break the floor
•During the middle of the cycle he will spawn in zombies, skeletons, and creepers to aid him.
•Sometimes arrows, TNT, and giant axes will be dropped from sky, you better keep moving.
•At the end of the cycle Vuco will fully repair the platform.
boss.void.hint.4:
Hints and strategies:
•Getting the boss down quickly before things get too out of hand is very important. During the later cycles there may be too many monsters wandering around that you will have to just focus on killing the boss before you die and ignoring the monsters as best as you can. In earlier phases however it is very recommended that you kill/knock off the zombies/skeletons that spawn.
•Be very careful of your positioning and try not to stand too close to any holes to avoid getting knocked off. If you do get knocked off and if you are quick enough you can ender pearl back onto it.
•Making the boss break the platform at the parts where the monsters spawn at will make any monsters that spawn there just fall to their death making there be less monsters in general.
•Konckback enchantment is very recommended.
•If you have a lot of players then you have to carefully plan your positioning and routing to reduce the area of cracked floor.
•Try and maximize the amount of time hitting the boss as best as you can.
boss.void.name: 虚空恶魔 Ethat
boss.void.line.1: §l浩劫? §l混亂? §l毀滅? §l我全部都要! §l小的們，§l快把我從這裡放出去!
boss.void.line.2: [§9Vuco§r] 让我把这片平台恢复成它原本的样子!
boss.void.line.3: 或许你应该见识一下虚空世界。小的们，上!
boss.void.lose: 喔哈哈哈哈哈哈！你的梦魇已经化为现实！
boss.first.hint.1:
装备/道具检查: 
• 建议穿上全套有保护附魔的铁装/钻石装，最好能有保护四。
• 如果有，你可以使用星界精华 III药水，但不是强制性的。
• 务必带上锋利四左右的剑来迎战，与其他Boss战不同的是这次亡灵杀手没有用处。
• 使用有燃烧效果的剑会让Boss更频繁地瞬移。
• 确认一下身上有没有快坏掉的装备。
boss.first.hint.2:
Boss能力解析:
• Boss开场会在中央召唤出一群人畜无害又可爱治愈的小兔子，它们在十秒后会变成杀手兔，开始横冲直撞、凶狠地袭击你。战斗中它会继续不时地召唤兔子出来。
• Boss每隔一段时间就会把所有玩家强制传送到场地中央，令玩家必须盯着他看，造成凋零伤害及两秒的立即伤害。
• Boss每过十五秒有一定机率瞬移到随机一名玩家身上。
• 如果战斗持续太久，Boss会进入第二阶段并且令场地四处燃烧起来，站在火焰中会受到大量伤害。
• 若战斗又持续了更久，他会开始对剩下的存活者施以雷击。
• Boss偶尔会跳起Dinnerbone之舞。让他自己上下颠倒，并发射大量三叉戟。
boss.first.hint.3:
提示与战术:
• 每当兔子出现时就要马上解决掉，这样你才不必应付成群的杀手兔。退到角落处会让你比较好解决向你飞扑过来的杀手兔。
• 需要回复饱食度时，你可以用箭射Boss，迫使他瞬移闪避，这样你就能安心吃东西。
• 别站在火焰中。
boss.first.win: 你根本就不懂……事情还没结束……
hint.1: If you have played CTM maps before or are playing this map on multiplayer you may want to set difficulty to hard for the first few areas.
hint.2: This area is made out of brown hardened clay which is very dark and hard to see without lights. If you are doing videos on this then I would highly suggest using these potions or making sure your videos are bright enough! =)! = )
hint.3: This area mainly uses positional spawners, meaning monsters will spawn at a specified location. I also made it so monsters do not burn up in sunlight! So the hillside might look peaceful now but stick around for too long and you might be overwhelmed! In order to stop the monsters from spawning you will have to find their spawner dens!
hint.4: Seeing how the last area was probably pretty combat intense I wanted to settle it down a bit with this area...However this area still has a few moments of it's own. Also if the player is looking for more of a challenge they could do the area at night! I think I might make that a "recurring theme" in this map actually, with outdoor areas being very chill and relaxing and the player has the option of doing it at night to make it more difficult...
hint.5: If item descriptions and titles are going off the screen then try setting your GUI scale to a lower setting
hint.6: Welcome to the Ultra Hardcore Water Cave area! In this area natural regeneration is turned off, some skills are also disabled, meaning you can only restore health by using potions and golden apples. Good luck, try not to take too much damage, and don't let the skeletons bite! =)
hint.7: Ensuring that all the cave is nice and bright will make it so no natural spawns can spawn, making the area a lot easier for you! Even just a natural spawned creeper could ruin your day!
hint.8: In order to dominate this area, you must use your senses to the fullest of your ability!
hint.9: Taking it slow and safe will guarantee success! Rushing through could snap right back on top of you! =(
hint.10: Making wide turns will make it a lot easier to see what is around the corner.
hint.11: Struggling a bit too much? Keep an eye out for chests, they will usually contain golden apples and other supplies to help you!
hint.12: Blocking off all paths but the path you are going will make it so monsters don't ambush you from behind. It can be key to your survival!
hint.13: One fatal mistake a lot of people make is that they don't take the time to look up!
hint.14: Stuck? Keep going north as much as you can and you should eventually find your way out.
hint.15: I hope you know what a bucket of milk does! =) It can be useful in these parts!
hint.16:
Need emeralds? You can get emeralds from various ways:
*Trading with villagers in the stalls on top of the hill
*From chests in dungeons
*There is 1 emerald block hidden in the trading district, 1 in the living district, 1 in the lighthouse, 1 in the docks, and 1 in each of the 3 dungeons
hint.17:
One of the earliest games I have ever played was Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time which I think is one of the best games ever! One of my best memories from that game was whenever it was about to be dark I'd run to Hyrule Castle before the drawbridge went up at dark and I would just fool around in the market place there for hours! Playing the mini-games, checking out the shops and what people had to say, getting tons of rupees from abusing the guard hut beside the drawbridge,
 and even just role-playing a bit and pretending one of the stray dogs wandering around town was mine! The whole town just had a great feeling attached to it and you always felt so safe there, at least until you go in the future and it all gets destroyed! I tried recreating that a bit here; you will probably be re-visiting this market place multiple times, buying goods, and will enjoy the fact that it should be almost 100%% monster proof! =)
hint.18:
•Short and quick assaults work best for this area.
•If your potion buffs run out you can always go back to the ship for more if you need it.
•To use a boat-a-chute go into a boat on the airship and hit F5. Move towards where you want to go and hit shift before you hit the ground or else you will die. Also make sure to grab assault potion buffs before hand.
hint.19: Use a hay bale on a horse to heal it.
hint.20: Monsters like to hunt in greater packs at night, be careful if you choose to venture out at such a time
hint.21: If you want an even greater challenge try climbing this mountain without a horse

hint.area.7:
7) §6§lArea Name§r: Tropical Islands of Nalu
§6§lApprox. Area Length§r: 60+ minutes
§6§lDifficulty§r: Medium

§6§lInspiration§r: Woah, lots of games! Legend of Zelda Wind Waker, Ocarina of Time Fire Temple, Paper Mario(TTYD), Final Fantasy X

att.hint: §e[#]§r 您的背包里有%s件未鉴定的装备。在§b物品栏中点击§r它们以鉴定！
hint.base: 欢迎来到忘却之地! 在这里你会看到用来摆放羊毛的纪念碑, 这是一个不会生怪的特殊地区, 还有一些地图特制系统: 可升级的玩家基地, 复原大地景观, 以及制作特殊装备的工匠系统等等。别忘了去纪念碑旁边的安山岩建筑里一探究竟……
item.terra_restore.lore: This item contains the power to restore once lost land
error.invalid_number: [!] 这里需要的是编号为%s的大地复苏！
event.new_restore: [§9Terra Restore§r] A new building has been restored to the land!
event.tree_reborn: [!] 追忆神木之子已经重生, 它会随着光阴流逝, 缓慢但确实地长成一株枝叶繁茂的大树, 并且守护这片大地免于邪恶侵犯!
hint.music:
[§aDEV§r] 游戏中美妙的音乐是由Radiarc, TheDashDub 和Makkon 作曲的。非常感谢这三位的乐曲不仅为地图增添了气氛, 也让我经由聆听这些曲子获得了一些地区的设计灵感。你可以在YouTube上面找到他们的频道: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/makkon06, 
https://www.youtube.com/user/TheDashDub, 
以及Radiarc 的https://www.youtube.com/user/PCHU13

 - Dahesor: 重制版中额外添加了一首来自大地复苏II的音乐，是由同样的作曲家创作的。
hint.merge:
§aPotion Packer - How to Use:§r
 - Put any potion inside the container beside, then launch the packer
 - Open the container again. These potions now stacks up to 16!

sign.1467.front_text.1: 因为我人很好, 你在
book.1.content.page0:
如果你愿意支持我的作品,
请不吝给予赞助. 目前我正
在制作Terra Restore的续作,
如果缺乏资金的话, 我会没
办法继续以全职的时间投入
开发, 那么一来续作可能就
还要十个月以上的时间才能
完成.
book.1.content.page1:
我非常享受制作这个游戏,
并且还有很多很棒的点子想
在Terra Restore 2里面实现!
若你决定赞助支持, 容我在
这里先行道谢! 我也了解很
多人心有余而力不足, 那并
没有关系.
book.1.content.page2:
你可以在地图的讨论串内找
到赞助的连结, 同时也欢迎
追随我的Youtube频道!
最后, 我希望你喜欢这张地
图, 在下个作品问世之前,
祝好运啰!

-mithey =)
book.1.title: 赞助说明书
entity.villager.5.name: fairune
entity.villager.6.name: typune
entity.enderman.1.name: exiel
item.stick.1.name: §6天国木枝
item.string.1.name: §6天国弦线
item.water_bucket.1.name: §e小蓝的蓝水桶
item.water_bucket.1.lore.line0: §d§o愿它助你对抗不死, 小心别打翻了!
storage.task: 英雄, 勿掉以轻心。exiel的残党们依然对这片大地虎视眈眈,他们不可信任, 是我们的重大威胁
storage.task.1: 时间不多了, 英雄, 我得走了。恐怕我们不会再碰面了...我们全靠你了。你的旅程将由此开始, 祝你好运。
team.iron_golem.name: iron_golem
team.player.name: player
team.boss.name: boss
team.time.name: time
team.mob_army.name: mob_army
legacy.opening.acts.1.line7: 英雄...在这片倪拉大地之上, 我们与exiel的军团所进行的漫长战争已经划下了句点
legacy.opening.acts.2.line10: 集合诸神之力, 我们成功将exiel这个恶魔逐回了他原本居住的次元。但尽管已事隔多年, 如今情势却依然险恶
legacy.opening.acts.3.line5: 大地仍然遍体鳞伤, 而腐败似乎又伴随着怪物的肆虐再次蔓延开来
legacy.opening.acts.4.line6: 你们是我们所有人的希望。你们的任务是踏上旅途, 使大地回复原本的面貌, 并消灭仍蛰伏于黑暗角落的腐败。我已赐予你完成使命的力量
legacy.opening.acts.4.line7: 你是我们所有人的希望。你的任务是踏上旅途, 使大地回复原本的面貌, 并消灭仍蛰伏于黑暗角落的腐败。我已赐予你完成使命的力量
legacy.opening.acts.5.line7: 你会在旅途中找到一种称为「大地复苏」的神秘物品, 你可以在勇者殿堂中使用它们来回复失土, 并将和平重新带回这片大地
legacy.opening.acts.6.line4: 你还必须找到所有的古代羊毛, 将他们摆回位于忘却之地的纪念碑上, 以让倪拉重新回归平静与祥和, 确保那些怪物带来的伤害不再重演
player.updates.2.main.line4:
[§aupdate§r] 下线期间数据包发生了更新。现在是数据版本1。
 - 使用右键的任意非技能行为后的0.25秒内将不会触发技能，以免误触
 - 修复了词条拥有重复id的bug。
 - §b旧版装备需要你手动修复：将他们脱下并放置于背包内（不在盔甲栏位，不在快捷栏），随后关闭并打开玩家页面。
 - 封闭了旧版的1.8配方系统。
